        Set credentials for an SMTP(S) mail account that is used to send error messages in case of an exception
        Parameters:
        host - Host name of the SMTP(S) mail server
        user - Mail server user name
        pwd - Mail server password
        port - Mail server port
        sender - Sender address
        receiver - Receiver mail address
        subject - Subject of the error mails to be sent
